page.title: 04Heronfield
page.content: Heronfield is an "odd place".Its 12 acres of land is a sanctuary for injured, badly treated and deserted {animals}as well as a business enterprise in the breeding and selling of animals as pets. Rabbits,guinea-pigs,gerbils,rats,mice, budgies and ducks are all bred for sale.The{'farm'}also houses exotic {creatures}like monkeys,llamas,a python a puma,a mynah bird,foxes and terra- pins which are displayed for visitors who leave a contribution towards the upkeep of the place. On grazing land live 18 ponies which are used for pony trekking down nearby country lanes. In addition to these activities,pets of local residents are looked after while owners are away on holiday.
